item.title: INEC Announces New Dates For 2023 Elections, Releases Election Guidelines
item.description: The Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) has announced new dates for the conduct of the 2023 general elections in Nigeria. INEC Chairman, Professor Mahmood Yakubu who announced the change during a press conference in Abuja on Saturday said the new dates became necessary as a result of the 2022 amended electoral act recently signed by President Muhammadu Buhari. Naija News reports according to what the INEC Chairman said that the Presidential and National Assembly elections will now hold on Saturday, February 25, 2023, instead of the earlier announced February 18 date.

item.title: 'Two Wrongs Don't Make A Right'
item.description: The Labour Party’s presidential candidate for the 2023 general election,Peter Obi, has criticized claims of reprisal attacks by the Nigerian Army over the killing of Nigerian army officials in Okuoma, Bomadi LGA, Delta. Condemning the retaliatory attack in a statement made available on his official X account, Obi suggested that a retaliatory attack on the community cannot compensate for the death of the soldiers. Naija News reports that Obi appealed to security agencies to be considerate and avoid transferring their anger onto hapless members of the community.

item.title: "I Never Meant It That Way"
item.description: The Governor of Benue State, Samuel Ortom has made a public apology after his viral statement that he won’t support a Fulani man to become the President of Nigeria. Speaking on Wednesday in Bauchi State, Ortom said his statement might have been taken out of context. It would be recalled that Ortom on Sunday while playing host to the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) G5 Governors in Benue State, said he would not be supporting the presidential candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Atiku Abubakar.

item.title: 56-year-old Widow Nabbed With Cocaine In Her Footwear
item.description: The National Drug Law Enforcement Agency (NDLEA) has confirmed the arrest of a woman at airports with cocaine. Naija News understands that the 56-year-old suspect, Ajisegiri Kehinde Sidika, had concealed the contraband substance in her footwear. The mother of four, who is also said to be a widow, was nabbed on Sunday (today) at the Murtala Muhammed International Airport, Lagos, while attempting to traffic 400g of cocaine concealed in her footwear to Makkah, Saudi Arabia.

item.description: Nigerian military industry boasted its home-made drone in the end of last year, but cannot send it for search and rescue mission in Sambisa forest to locate kidnapped Chibok girls. NAF PR & Information Director, Air Commodore Yusuf Anas, explained the current situation with Nigerian-made drone, GULMA, in a statement on May 27, 2014, Tuesday.

item.title: NERC, Discos Ordered To Suspend Tariff Hike
item.description: The committee set up to moderate issues concerning Power in the House of Representatives, has directed the Nigeria Electricity Regulatory Commission (NERC) to suspend its planned electricity increment. Chaired by Aliyu Magaji, the committee made the announcement today during a meeting with NERC and other stakeholders. Earlier, the electricity regulatory body announced that it plans to hike the price which will take effect from April. In the meeting, the Minister of Power, Mamman Saleh was represented by the Permanent Secretary of the ministry, Ahmed Abdul.

LP Inaugurates Presidential Campaign Council
item.description: The Labour Party (LP) has inaugurated its Presidential Campaign Council ahead of the 2023 general elections. Naija News reports that the LP National Chairman, Julius Abure, performed the inauguration at the party’s National Secretariat in Abuja on Friday. Speaking during the inauguration, Abure said the party’s major challenge is the lack of funds to run campaigns, stating that the 2023 general election is very expensive. He disclosed that party members would have to support the campaign with funds, stating that the presidential candidate, Peter Obi, cannot fund the campaigns alone.

item.title: Netflix's 'Wednesday' Is Somehow Darker and Quirkier Than We Could Have Imagined
item.description: The latest nostalgia-based Netflix project, 'Wednesday,' brings the Addams Family into the modern era with a young-adult twist. Here's what to expect. Source: NetflixThe latest nostalgia-based Netflix project, Wednesday, brings the Addams Family into the modern era with a young-adult twist. The series follows Wednesday Addams, the angsty teen daughter of Morticia and Gomez Addams (first introduced in comic strips from the 1930s). Unlike previous iterations of the character, this Wednesday is on her own, as she attends Nevermore Academy: a school for outcasts, where even she doesn’t quite fit in.

Matawalle Sacks All Commissioners, Dissolves State Executive Council
item.description: Zamfara State Governor, Bello Matawalle has dissolved the state executive council with immediate effect. The Governor also sacked all Chairmen and members of the state Commissions and Boards of various agencies. Also affected by the Governor’s directive are the Secretary to the State Government, the Chief of Staff, and the Deputy Chief of Staff. The directive was contained in a statement on Monday by the Governor’s Special Adviser on Public Enlightenment, media and Communications, Zailani Bappa.

item.title: Afisa wa polisi apoteza maisha yake baada ya kugongwa na gari
item.description: - Kulingana na ripoti za polisi Nickson Kiprono, alikuwa akivuka barabara mwendo wa saa nane usiku alipogongwa na gari - Gari hilo lilikuwa linaendeshwa na Jackline Nduku Nzioko ambaye alikuwa anatoka kambi ya Embakasi kuelekea Utawala - Uchunguzi kuhusu kilichosababisha ajali hiyo unaendelea Afisa wa polisi alifariki dunia baada ya kugongwa na gari mapema Alhamisi, Disemba 26 Eastern bypass karibu na taasisi ya mafunzi ya Wanajeshi. Ripoti zimeonesha kuwa afisa huyo, Nickson Kiprono, alikuwa akivuka barabara mwendo wa saa nane usiku alipogongwa na gari lililokuwa linaendeshwa na dereva aliyetambulika kama Jackline Nduku Nzioko.

item.title: Court Orders Immediate Arrest Of Ex-Petroleum Minister, Diezani
item.description: Justice Bolaji Olajuwon of the Federal High Court in Abuja has ordered the immediate arrest of the former Minister of Petroleum Resources, Diezani Alison-Madueke. Naija News reports that the presiding judge gave the order on Monday following the application by the Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC) counsel, Farouk Abdullah, for an arrest warrant against the ex-minister. Recall that Justice Ijeoma Ojukwu was initially the presiding judge in the matter, but the case was reassigned to Justice Olajuwon, following the transfer of Ojukwu to the Calabar division of the court.

item.title: Eleanor Roosevelt - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: The longest serving First Lady in US History and feminist icon who was known for her humanitarian efforts. In her long career in politics, she fought for an expanded role of women in the workplace, the civil rights of African-Americans, and the rights of World War II veterans and refugees. Before Fame She did volunteer work for the New York Junior League and became fluent in French. Trivia She had a very close relationship with Associated Press reporter Lorena Hickok and many historians contend that there was a sexual component to their friendship.

item.title: IGP Egbetokun Visits NSA, Nuhu Ribadu (Photos)
item.description: The acting Inspector-General of Police, Kayode Egbetokun on Tuesday met with the National Security Adviser (NSA), Mallam Nuhu Ribadu. According to the Force Public Relations Officer, CSP Olumuyiwa Adejobi who made this known in a statement, the meeting is part of efforts to strengthen internal security and improve synergy among security institutions in the country. He added that the meeting which took place at the Office of the National Security Adviser, Three Arms Zone, Abuja is to consolidate on the gains recorded so far in the internal security architecture of the nation.

item.title: FIRS Grants Full Waiver On Accumulated Penalties, Interests Till December 31
item.description: The Federal Inland Revenue Service (FIRS) has announced a full waiver on accumulated penalties and interests for outstanding tax liabilities until December 31, 2023. The FIRS chairman, Zacch Adedeji, made this known in a statement on Sunday by his Special Adviser on Media, Dare Adekanmbi. Adedeji said the decision was to alleviate the burden on taxpayers and businesses and to promote compliance with tax laws. The FIRS chairman said penalties and interests are imposed for failure by companies to fulfil their tax obligation as and when due as stipulated in extant tax laws.

item.title: 2023: Nigeria Will Witness Overwhelming Transformation With Tinubu As President

item.title: 5 Simple Tricks to Ease Our Worries

item.title: Gunmen Kill Four Mining Workers In Plateau
item.description: Four workers at a mining site in Dong village in Plateau State have been shot dead on Saturday evening. It was gathered that some unknown gunmen stormed the mining site around 6pm and started shooting sporadically at the workers. During the attack, four male workers were killed and a woman who was injured was rushed to a nearby hospital and currently receiving treatment. Confirming the attack, Plateau Police Command spokesman, ASP Gabriel Ubah, said armed policemen have been deployed to the area and normalcy has returned to the area.

item.title: Hallowed Judiciary Can't Be Politicians' Playground
item.description: In their deleterious desperation to upend opponents, Nigerian politicians are again dragging the nation’s judiciary to the mud with pliant judges as their enablers. This is with the indiscriminate issuance of conflicting injunctions by courts of equal jurisdiction on the same subject matter. This pastime of politicians and conniving judges got so bizarre that the Chief Justice of Nigeria, Justice Tanko Muhammad, summoned the Chief Justices of Rivers, Anambra, Jigawa, Kebbi, Imo, and Cross River States.

item.title: 50 Killed, 172,000 Farmlands Swept In Adamawa Communities Official
item.description: The executive secretary of Adamawa Emergency Management Agency (ADSEMA), Malam Suleiman Mohammed, has lamented the wrecking of residential houses, farmlands, and businesses and the loss of lives caused by floods in local communities in Adamawa State recently. According to the official, no fewer than fifty people have been killed in recent floods across eleven communities in Adamawa. Mohammed who spoke with journalists in Yola, the state capital on Friday, disclosed that at least seventy-one other people have suffered degrees of injuries from the incidents.

item.title: 'How Tinubu Lambasted Fubara At Peace Meeting With Wike'
item.description: President Bola Tinubu, on Monday, allegedly lambasted the Governor of Rivers State, Siminalayi Fubara, during a peace meeting at the Presidential Villa, Abuja. Naija News had earlier reported that Tinubu met with Fubara, a former governor of Rivers State, Nyesom Wike and other Rivers stakeholders. Two sources who were present at the meeting confirmed to Premium Times that President Tinubu lambasted Fubara at the meeting. The meeting had in attendance Vice President Kashim Shettima, the National Security Adviser, Nuhu Ribadu, a former governor of Rivers State, Peter Odili, and the chairpersons of the PDP and the APC in Rivers.

Peter Obi Won 2023 Presidential Election
item.description: A former Secretary to the Government of the Federation (SGF), Babachir Lawal on Tuesday claimed that the presidential candidate of the Labour Party (LP), Peter Obi, won the February 25 presidential election. According to Lawal, the election was not won by the presidential candidate of the All Progressives Congress, Bola Tinubu who was declared by the Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC). He further stated that available factual data as aggregated from several independent sources indicated that Obi got the majority votes while the presidential candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party, Atiku Abubakar came second in the election.

They were known for hits like "Stayin' Alive," "More Than A Woman," and "Night Fever." Before Fame He grew up in a part of Brisbane that was demolished to build Brisbane Airport. His first band was called the Rattlesnakes. Trivia He is a Songwriters Hall of Fame and Rock and Roll Hall of Fame inductee.

item.title: Where Is D-Lo From 'We Are the Brooklyn Saints' Now? What We Know
item.description: Where Is Dalontai "D-Lo" Davis From 'We Are the Brooklyn Saints' Now?By Shannon RaphaelJan. 29 2021, Published 3:02 p.m. ET Source: NetflixWhile many sports docuseries focus on underdogs or teams with championship streaks, We Are the Brooklyn Saints is different. The show is Netflix's latest take on a team-focused story that also highlights the talents of a few key individuals. Unlike the Bulldogs from Navarro College on Cheer or the NFL hopefuls featured on Last Chance U, the We Are the Brooklyn Saints follows a youth football team through a fairly average season in 2019.

item.title: CBN Governor Sanusi Accuses Pastor Adeboye Of Aiding Corrupt Rogue Banker Akingbola To Evade Justice
item.description: The governor of Nigeria’s Central Bank, Sanusi Lamido Sanusi, has accused the General Overseer of the Redeemed Christian Church of God, Pastor Enoch Adejare Adeboye, of playing a role in shielding Erasmus Akingbola, the corrupt former Chief Executive Officer of InterContinental Bank PLC, from serious prosecution. Nigerian authorities asserted that the rogue former banking executive siphoned over N200 billion from the commercial bank he ran. Officials of the Economic and Financial Crimes Commission also accused Mr.

item.title: Ex-Lagos Gov With Walking Stick
item.description: The National Leader of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Bola Tinubu, and his close aides are allegedly angry with the Presidency for publishing photos of the former Lagos State Governor with a walking stick. Naija News reports that following speculations about Tinubu’s health, President Buhari had paid him a visit in London UK but observers of pictures taken at the meeting spotted the APC leader holding a stick which is used to aid walking.

item.title: Legendary Actor Bill Cobbs Has Died at Age 90 (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Legendary Actor Bill Cobbs Has Died at Age 90 (EXCLUSIVE)"He is a legend in every way you can imagine. As a human, a performer, you can't get better than Bill Cobbs," Bill's rep said in a comment to Distractify. By Elissa NoblittPublished June 26 2024, 4:36 p.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesLegendary actor Bill Cobbs, who featured in more than 200 films and TV shows according to his IMDb profile, has passed away at the age of 90, as confirmed to Distractify by his rep, Carmela Evangelista of Evangelista Talent Management.

item.title: Nigeria Receives Another Batch Of COVID-19 Vaccines
item.description: The Nigerian Government has taken delivery of additional 1,233,200 doses of the Johnson & Johnson vaccine. Naija News reports that the Johnson & Johnson vaccine arrived in the country last Saturday through the AVATT platform, coordinated by the African Union Commission. Speaking to reporters on Wednesday, Executive Director, National Primary Health Care Development Agency (NPHCDA), Faisal Shuaib, said the latest vaccine was part of the 39,800,000 doses procured by the federal government.

item.title: Top Boko Haram Commander Surrenders
item.description: A top Commander of the Jamā’at Ahl as-Sunnah lid-Da’wah wa’l-Jihād also known as Boko Haram, Khaid Malam Ali and his lieutenant Bunu Umar has surrendered to the troops of Operation Hadin Kai in the North East of Borno state. Ali and his fighters were reportedly dislodged by the ISWAP terrorists group after they coordinated a raid at the hideouts of Boko Haram in Bula Alhaji Garwaye in the fringes of Sambisa forest Near Bama LGA on, July 5, 2023

item.description: There are a ton of rare rose varieties on ‘Animal Crossing’: Here's how to get black and gold roses on ‘ACNH’, along with other varieties. Source: Nintendo via TwitterCultivating hybrid flowers on Animal Crossing New Horizons can be a fun but frustrating process. While some hybrids seem to sprout with little to no effort on your part others definitely require a little more know-how. There are multiple varieties of rose in the game, for example, but some are easier to coax out of the ground than others.

item.title: Kaduna Govt Announces Nuhu Bamali As New Emir Of Zazzau
item.description: The Kaduna State Government has announced Alhaji Ahmed Nuhu Bamalli as the new Emir of Zazzau. His appointment as a replacement for the late Alhaji Shehu Idris who died on Sunday, 20th September was announced by the government on Wednesday, 7th October. His appointment was confirmed in a statement on Wednesday signed by Ja’afaru Ibrahim Sani, the Kaduna State Commissioner for Local Government Affairs. According to a statement by the government of Kaduna, Alhaji Bamalli is from the Mallawa ruling house and he is the first emir from the Mallawa ruling house in 100 years following the demise in 1920 of his grandfather, Emir Dan Sidi.

Actress Dakota Johnson is set to play the titular role in the film. And now, Sydney Sweeney has been confirmed to co-star opposite Dakota in Madame Web.

item.title: How to Watch the Rose Bowl Parade in 2023
item.description: Curious how to watch the Rose Parade in 2023? Don't fret, we've got the answers right here. Each year, the holiday season is filled with a variety of larger-than-life events that captivate the attention of millions of viewers worldwide. From tree-lightings to star-studded holiday concert bills and global new years celebrations, there's a lot to party about at the end of the calendar year. Next up on the docket is the annual Tournament of Roses, which bring the traditions of the Rose Parade and Rose Bowl Game to Pasadena, Cal.

item.title: Kristy Swanson, the OG 'Buffy the Vampire Slayer,' Joins 'SEAL Team'
item.description: 'Buffy the Vampire Slayer' alum, Kristy Swanson, joins David Boreanaz in Season 2 of 'SEAL Team' as his potential love interest. Source: CBSYou may not recognize Kristy Swanson’s name, but chances are you’ve seen at least one of her movies or a TV episode that she’s guest-starred on. The 49-year-old has been acting in Hollywood since 1984, and boasts major credits like Pretty in Pink, Ferris Bueller’s Day Off, and the original Flowers in the Attic.

item.title: Obasanjo Proffers Solution To Tinubu On How To Tackle Current Economic Hardship
item.description: Former Nigerian President, Olusegun Obasanjo, has suggested possible solutions on how President Bola Tinubu’s administration can alleviate the ongoing economic crisis in the country. Naija News reports that Obasanjo, who was represented by a former Governor of Niger State, Babangida Aliyu, while speaking at the public presentation of the book “Court and Politics,” authored by Dr. Umar Ardo, attributed the hardship to a lack of productivity among Nigerians and mismanagement of resources.

item.title: One Dead, Many Injured As Explosion Rocks Kano [Video]
item.description: One person has been confirmed died and many others injured during an explosion on Aba Road, Sabon Gari area of Kano State. Naija News gathered that the explosion occurred on Tuesday morning in the area. Footage from the sad incident showed that the blast affected a building with at least one corpse seen on the scene. The number of casualties is still unknown, but many people were reported dead and several sustained degrees of injuries.

item.title: Residents Flee As Fulani Herdsmen Attack Oyo Community, Kill 10
item.description: Gunmen suspected to be Fulani Herdsmen have attacked Igangan community, in the Ibarapa North area of Oyo state killing no fewer than 10 residents. It was gathered that the Fulani herdsmen attacked the Oyo community at around 11pm on Saturday, leaving the village early Sunday morning. A source in the community identified two of the people killed as Lekan and Ajani, while a resident of Ayete who is close to the family of the deceased farmers, Olalekan Etu disclosed that hunters were already on their way to track down the Fulani killers.

item.title: Arsenal's Arteta Tests Positive For Coronavirus
item.description: Former Manchester City assistant and Arsenal manager, Mikel Arteta, on Thursday tested positive to COVID-19, also known as Coronavirus. Naija News understands that Arsenal have closed their London Colney training ground and club staff who had recent contact with Arteta will now go into self-isolation. The Premier League officials will on Friday hold “an emergency club meeting” to discuss future fixtures. “This is really disappointing but I took the test after feeling poorly,” said Spaniard Arteta, 37.

item.title: The Number of Good Singers on 'I Can See Your Voice' Varies by Episode
item.description: The objective of the Fox gameshow is for the contestant to eliminate the bad singer from the group, but how many good singers are there? Source: FoxAs of late, Fox has stepped up their reality television game with the second season of I Can See Your Voice. The game show, which features Adrienne Bailon-Houghton and Cheryl Hines as the permanent panelists, as well as Ken Jeong as the host, challenges a rotating panel of celebrity music fanatics to help a contestant determine whether mystery singers are talented.

item.title: This Mom Was Not Having The Unsolicited Parenting Advice She And Her Twins Got
item.description: Mom With Twins Gets Unsolicited Parenting Advice And Exacts The Perfect RevengeBy Aimee LutkinUpdated Nov. 18 2019, 2:15 p.m. ET Source: iStockProbably every mom has experienced this: you're out with your kids, and they're having a day. One's crying, the other is kicking a rock at a duck, you've dropped the bag with the eggs in it. Life gets overwhelming sometimes. Then all of a sudden some busybody comes on over to tell you the reason your kids are overstimulated is that they're wearing too much red, or something ridiculous.

item.title: Xavi Confirms Move To Barcelona As Koeman's Replacement
item.description: Former Spanish International, Xavi Hernandez has confirmed he has agreed to take over FC Barcelona as their new head coach. Naija News recalls that Barca sent packing their former manager, Ronald Koeman last week for failing to meet targets. However, amid rumour of who to succeed Koeman at Camp Nou, Hernandez who is currently the head coach at Al-Sadd, said he has been in talks with Barcelona to become their new manager.

item.title: Biden Announces Delegation To Attend Tinubus Inauguration (Full List)
item.description: The United State President, Joe Biden, has announced his delegation to attend the inauguration of the President-elect, Bola Tinubu on May 29th in Abuja. Naija News reports that Biden, in a statement released on the White House website on Monday night, May 22, 2023, announced a nine-member delegation for the event. Tinubu will be sworn in as the 16th President of Nigeria at Eagle Square, Abuja and no fewer than 65 world leaders, including Heads of State, have been invited to grace the event.

item.title: Don't Be Ungrateful, Bola Tinubu Used His Money To Promote You
item.description: A member of the House of Representatives, Jame Faleke has slammed the Minister of Interior, Rauf Aregbesola, for being ungrateful despite the national leader of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Bola Tinubu, doing so much for him. Naija News reports that Aregbesola and Tinubu have been at loggerheads over activities related to the upcoming Osun State governorship election. The Minister, who had accused Tinubu of playing God, claimed that the former Lagos State Governor imposed Governor Gboyega Oyetola on the people of Osun State.

item.description: The Queen of Jazz who won thirteen Grammy Awards and became a legend for singing "Into Each Life Some Rain Must Fall" and "I'm Making Believe." Before Fame After the death of her mother in 1932, she worked as a lookout for a bordello and for a Mafioso numbers runner. Trivia Her rendition of "Summertime" with Louis Armstrong is considered one of the best collaborations in music history. Family Life She married Benjamin Kornegay on December 26, 1941 and, after their annulment in 1943, she married Ray Brown on December 10, 1947.

Rishi Sunak Becomes UK's New Prime Minister
item.description: British Conservative, Rishi Sunak has emerged as the new Leader of the United Kingdom’s Conservative Party. Naija News reports that this was disclosed in an announcement made by Sir Graham Brady after only one nomination was received by the 1922 Committee for the new leader of the party and backed by 100 MPs. Brady, therefore, declared Sunak to be the next party leader, and consequently the new Prime Minister. He confirmed that the new Tory leader, Rishi Sunak will address MPs at 14:30 BST.

item.title: Switzerland To Return $300m Abacha's Loot To Nigeria
item.description: Switzerland’s government has concluded plans to transfer to the Nigerian government, the sum of $300 million recovered from the family of former military dictator, General Sani Abacha. This disclosure was made known by the minister of foreign affairs, Geoffrey Onyeama on Monday, January, 11. The fund to be transferred is said to be part of an estimated $5 billion stolen and kept in foreign accounts by the late military ruler.

item.title: 3-0 Comebacks Are Exceedingly Rare in Playoff Series
item.description: 3-0 Comebacks Don't Happen Often in Pro Sports, but They Aren't ImpossibleThe Mavericks and Oilers are both down 3-0 in their respective finals. Could either team see a comeback? By Joseph AllenJun. 14 2024, Published 10:22 a.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesIf the Dallas Mavericks want to win the NBA Finals, they're going to have to do what no team has done before. The team is down 3-0 in a best of seven series, and no team has ever come back from that deficit to win any playoff series, let alone the finals.

item.description: What's Really Going on Between Austen Kroll and Kristin Cavallari?By Shannon RaphaelPublished Dec. 17 2020, 12:33 p.m. ET Source: Instagram / BravoLet's face it, Kristin Cavallari and Austen Kroll have been showcasing the highs and lows of their respective relationships on reality TV for years. Kristin has been a staple on the small screen for more than a decade-and-a-half after getting her start on MTV's Laguna Beach. item.title: Panic As Gunmen In Military Uniforms Strike On Lagos-Ibadan Expressway
item.description: Gunmen suspected to be kidnappers have attacked passengers along the Lagos -Ibadan expressway. According to one of the passengers who traveled on the road, the gunmen wore military uniforms when they struck shortly before Shagamu on the expressway on Tuesday. They were said to have emerged from the bush and started to shoot sporadically at a commercial bus loaded with passengers. The shooting according to Punch, had damaged the commercial bus conveying the passengers while another passenger lamented the absence of policemen during the operation.

item.title: Wike Vows Never To Accept Northern Dominance In PDP
item.description: The Rivers State Governor, Nyesom Wike on Wednesday vowed not to accept northern dominance in the leadership of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP). Governor Wike and his allies have been calling for the resignation of the National Chairman of the party, Iyorchia Ayu over northern dominance. The camp of the Rivers State Governor had insisted that the National Chairman of the party and the presidential candidate of the party, Atiku Abubakar can not come from the same region.

item.title: January 10 Horoscope and Zodiac
item.description: Determined and intelligent, your natural abilities are well-suited for a variety of career paths, although choosing one may be difficult. Your gifts for communication and order would translate well into careers such as law, law enforcement and teaching. Similarly, your quick mind would be a good fit for the demanding world of business, finance or economics. If you find an issue worth dedicating yourself to, a career in the political arena may be rewarding, such was the case for Grigori Rasputin, who was also born on January 10th.

item.title: Zenith Bank's Share Price Breaks Records, Outperforms GTCO On NGX
item.description: Nigeria’s leading financial institution, Zenith Bank Plc, ended the trading session at N25.50 per share, N0.30 kobo higher than GTCO’s closing price of N25.20, following sell-pressures that dragged the Holding company’s shares down 0.98 percent from N25.45 to N25.50. The NGX closed lower on the back of sell-offs and buy-interests as the benchmark All-Share Index (ASI) fell 34 basis points. item.description: England-born professional footballer, Ademola Lookman, has explained why he accepted the invitation to play for the Nigerian National team. Naija News understands that Ademola currently plays as a winger for Premier League club Leicester City, on loan from Bundesliga club RB Leipzig. The 24-year-old player had represented England at youth levels and was among the U-20 side that won the FIFA World Cup in South Korea back in 2017. The young lad in February 2022, received approval from the Federation Of International Football Association (FIFA) to represent Nigeria through his parents.

item.title: Nigerian Actress, Genoveva Umeh Reveals Why she Dumped Law For Acting
item.description: British-Nigerian actress, Genoveva Umeh has disclosed that she decided to venture into acting after failing a law exam in her first year. The actress made this known whilst featuring on the latest episode of ‘Is This Seat Taken’ podcast with Chinasa Anukam where she noted that although acting has always been her passion, she didn’t study it in the first place. The film star said she had initially studied law but later opted for acting following her disappointing first-year grade at the varsity.

item.title: 'It's Absolutely Disgusting'- Carragher Blasts Wrong World Cup Timing
item.description: Liverpool legend, Jamie Carragher has criticized the timing of the Qatar 2022 World Cup following Son Heung-min’s Injury. The South Korean skipper had to exit Tuesday night’s Champions League match between Spurs and Marseille due to a serious eye injury. The Korean was struck in the left cheekbone during his team’s victory at the Orange Vélodrome stadium. Tottenham’s number seven had to leave the field due to swelling in his eye after being struck in the left cheekbone during his team’s 2-1 victory, but he was later able to celebrate the last-16 progress with his team.

item.title: Laraine Day - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: MGM star of the 1940s who played nurse Mary Lamont in a series of Dr. Kildare movies. Although MGM used her for mostly B-movie roles, while on loan to other studio she got to star in several Alfred Hitchcock and Cecil b. DeMille films. Before Fame After acting on stage with the Long Beach players, she got a bit in a 1937 film, and from there received a contract with MGM. Trivia She played Eileen Daly in the 1939 film Sergeant Madden.

item.title: Mwanafunzi wa SDA atimuliwa shule kwa kukataa kufanya mitihani Jumamosi
item.description: -Binti huyo wa Kidato cha Pili anatoka familia ya wafuasi sugu wa SDA lakini husomea shule inayofadhiliwa na Kanisa Katoliki -Siku ya kanisa ya wafuasi wa Seventh Day Adventists (SDAs) ni Jumamosi -Alifukuzwa shule baada ya kukataa kukalia mtihani Jumamosi kwa kusema ilikuwa kinyume na imani yake -Babake sasa anafikiria kumhamiha shule Habari Nyingine: Makachero wanaochunguza mauaji ya Monica Kimani wanamtafuta Jacque Maribe Mwanafunzi wa Kidato cha pili katika shule moja ya kitaifa Kisii amefukuzwa shuleni baada ya kukataa kukalia mtihani Jumamosi kwa kusema kuwa ilikuwa kinyume na imani yake.

item.title: Nigeria Has Qualified Christians Tinubu Can Pick As Running Mate
item.description: The All Progressives Congress (APC) presidential candidate, Bola Tinubu has received another knock over his single-faith presidential ticket for the 2023 election. Tinubu had on Sunday declared he has chosen former Governor of Borno State, Kashim Shettima as his running mate for the forthcoming election, sticking to his initial Muslim-Muslim agenda despite calls to pick a Christian as his running mate. Joining a host of others to say no to the single-faith ticket, a chieftain of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Dr Mustapha Aliyu on Monday, said the ruling party’s ambition is to divide Nigeria along religious lines, disorganise the people and raise tension among the poor.

item.title: Ohanaeze Reacts As Buhari Vows Not To Release Nnamdi Kanu
item.description: Apex Igbo socio-cultural group, Ohanaeze Ndigbo has reacted to President Muhammadu Buhari’s dismissal of the plea to release the leader of the Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB), Nnamdi Kanu. In an interview with Channels Television aired on Wednesday night, Buhari asked Kanu to defend himself in court for spreading false information about Nigeria when he was in the United Kingdom. The president insisted that he would not interfere in any judicial process relating to the pro-Biafra agitator, thereby shattering the hope of some individuals calling for Kanu’s release.

item.title: Amosuns Political Godson, Akinlade Joins PDP In Ogun
item.description: Former All Progressives Congress (APC) member, Adekunle Akinlade has joined the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) in Ogun State. Naija News understands that Akinlade joined the opposition camp just a few days after parting way with the APC over alleged injustice among other issues. The politician is a political godson to former Governor of Ogun State, Ibikunle Amosun. Akinlade was received into the PDP fold on at the party’s secretariat along Okemosan, Abeokuta to meet with party leaders, Naija News understands.

item.description: The Shorty Awards Were Announced and These Nominees Came From TikTokBy Lizzy RosenbergUpdated Jan. 21 2020, 6:09 p.m. ET Source: InstagramInternet addicts, rejoice — you've most likely been anticipating the unveiling of the 2020 Shorty Awards nominees for weeks now, and luckily, the top contenders were officially announced on Tuesday, Jan. 21. As the Shorty Awards are ever-changing, (like the world wide web we've come to know and love), it should come as no surprise that a number of nominees rolled over from 2019's most popular app, TikTok.

item.description: Tons of Xbox users are asking: "Why does the YouTube app keep singing me out of my console?" The issue could be this. Source: YouTube | @shadowgamingThere are throngs of people who rely on using home consoles as their primary source of entertainment that extends beyond just gaming. Business Insider reports that some 54% of all TV streaming devices are people's home consoles, so it would make sense for companies like Microsoft, Sony, and Nintendo to ensure that they dedicate resources to support these popular streaming applications.

item.title: Annalise Bishop - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Known as the second daughter of Oscar-winning actor Jamie Foxx, whose birth name is Eric Bishop. She was his second daughter to two women. Before Fame Her father rose to prominence as a comedian on In Living Color. He later found success as a dramatic actor, winning the 2005 Best Actor Oscar for his performance in the film Ray. Trivia She has been pictured on multiple occasions on vacation with her father and mother.

item.title: Gugu Mbatha-Raw - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Played Tish Jones on the BBC drama Doctor Who. She also appeared in the 2013 film Belle and the series Touch. She was cast as Plumette in the 2017 feature Beauty and the Beast and plays Dr. Kate Murry in 2018's A Wrinkle in Time.  Before Fame She attended the Royal Academy of Dramatic Art. Trivia She was in the romantic comedy Larry Crowne, starring Tom Hanks. Family Life Her parents are doctor Patrick Mbatha and nurse Anne Raw.

item.title: NNPCL To Roll Out CNG Filling Station Q1 Of 2024
item.description: As part of the search for cleaner and cheaper fuel following the removal of fuel subsidy, the Nigerian National Petroleum Company (NNPC) Limited has unveiled plans to roll out Compressed Natural Gas (CNG) filling stations across the country. The petroleum company, as gathered by Naija News, has partnered with NIPCO Gas Limited to construct the CNG stations to be ready in the first quarter of 2024. In a statement issued on Thursday by the NNPCL Chief Corporate Communications Officer, Garba Deen Muhammad, the company targets the construction of 35 states of the CNG station across the federation with three mother stations.

item.title: PDP Reacts To Suspension Of Imo Lawmakers
item.description: The Imo state chapter of the Peoples Democratic Party has condemned the suspension of some members of the State House of Assembly. Naija News reported on Tuesday that the state assembly had suspended the minority leader, Anyadike Nwosu, and five other lawmakers. In a statement issued on Friday by its Publicity Secretary, Ogubundu Nwadike, the PDP described the suspension of the six lawmakers as undemocratic. Nwadike added that the action of the assembly is too vindictive, highhanded, dehumanizing and provocative.

item.title: The exes on Season 1 of 'The Big D' Are Bringing the Drama
item.description: USA Network's reality TV dating series 'The Big D' introduces viewers to twelve hot divorcees hoping to find love in paradise. Meet the cast! Popular series like Love Is Blind and Temptation Island have given reality TV shows a major facelift. That said, USA Network’s The Big D takes singles on a journey unlike one we’ve ever seen. Hosted by husband and wife duo — JoJo Fletcher and Jordan Rodgers, two ex-Bachelorette stars who know a thing or two about navigating the treacherous waters of love on TV — Season 1 of The Big D debuted in June of 2023.

item.title: Khonshu Seems Pretty Evil in 'Moon Knight' Could He Be the Secret Villain?
item.description: As ‘Moon Knight’ fans know, Marc Spector acts as Khonshu’s avatar. Now, Khonshu seems to be more antagonistic — but is Khonshu actually evil? Source: Marvel StudiosSpoiler alert: This article contains spoilers for Episode 2 of Moon Knight. Now that the second episode of Moon Knight is upon us, many of us have questions about the true intentions of the anti-hero … and the Egyptian God he serves. It’s now completely clear that Moon Knight is Egyptian God Khonshu’s avatar, meaning that Moon Knight is forced to do Khonshu’s Earthly bidding.

item.title: Melinda Gates - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Created a charitable foundation with her then-husband Bill Gates. She and Bill were married for 27 years. Before Fame She earned a computer science and economics degree and later an MBA, both from Duke University. Trivia She was the project manager for Microsoft Bob, Microsoft Encarta and Expedia. Family Life She had her first child, Jennifer, in April 1996, followed by Rory in May 1999 and Phoebe in September 2002. Her mother was a homemaker and her father was an engineer.

item.title: Wike Gets Fresh Appointment From PDP, APC Kicks
item.description: The Rivers State Governor, Nyesom Wike has been appointed by the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) as the chairman of the 22-man campaign council for this weekend’s Ogoja/Yala federal and Akpabuyo state constituencies by-election in Cross River State. A statement on Tuesday from the PDP National Working Committee which was signed by the party’s National Publicity Secretary, Hon. Debo Ologunagba revealed that Wike will be joined by Governor Udom Emmanuel of Akwa Ibom State as the co-chairman in leading the PDP campaign team.

item.title: Atiku/PDP Crisis: Wike Suffering From Karma For Past Sins
item.description: A chieftain of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Eze Chukwumeka Eze says the current political travails of the Rivers State Governor, Nyesom Wike are a recompense for his past deeds. Eze, in a personally signed statement made available to journalists in Port Harcourt on Friday, claimed Wike had at various times in the past encouraged and participated in obviously wrong political moves against others. He, therefore, argued that Wike losing the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) presidential ticket and then the chance to become the Vice Presidential candidate of the party for the 2023 elections is due to the effect of karma.

item.title: Keyamo Reveals Reason For Conflict In Afenifere, Says Tinubu's Visit To Fasoranti Has Nothing To Do
item.description: The All Progressives Congress (APC) has responded to those pointing accusing fingers at the party’s presidential candidate, Bola Tinubu for being the cause of the conflict between the leaders of Afenifere, Pa Reuben Fasoranti, and Cheif Ayo Adebanjo. The APC said it will be unfair for anybody to link Tinubu’s campaign visit to Fasoranti Akure’s home two weeks ago as the reason for the crisis currently rocking the leadership of the Pan-Yoruba group.

item.title: Pastor Enoch Adeboye Reveals 2015 Prophecies
item.description: Just as the world has mixed feelings of the new year with prospects and that of the groans of heavy yoke of insurgency with no permanent relief nearby, the General Overseer of the Redeemed Christian Church of God (RCCG), Pastor Enoch Adejare Adeboye, has made new predictions. The revered man of God, in his prophecies listed under four categories of Individuals, International, RCCG and Nigeria, has also predicted that the dreaded Ebola Virus Disease, which has killed over 7,000 people so far, will finally die.

item.title: Senator Adebayo Salami Is Dead
item.description: A former Nigerian senator and chieftain of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Adebayo Salami, has died. Naija News reports that Senator Adebayo Salami died in the United States of America (USA) on Thursday, January 7, 2021, but the cause of his death is yet to be ascertained. Unconfirmed report however revealed that his death might not be unconnected with COVID-19 complications. Before his death, Senator Adebayo Salami represented Osun Central Senatorial District in Nigerian Senate at the inception of the fourth republic in 1999 on the platform of the Alliance for Democracy (AD) platform.

item.title: Only Two Couples Stayed Together on 'Married at First Sight' Season 9
Senate Takes Decision On CBNs Naira Redesign Plan
item.description: The Nigeria Senate on Wednesday resolved to provide legislative support for the policy of the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) to redesign the naira. Naija News reports that CBN Governor, Godwin Emefiele, had on October 26, announced the plan to redesign the Naira to control the money supply. According to him, the redesigned notes include N200, N500, and ₦1,000. He stated that the new N200, N500, and ₦1,000 notes will go into circulation from December 15, while the current notes will cease to be legal tender by January 31, 2023.

item.title: Tension As Police Take Over PDP Secretariat In Abia
item.description: Tension has been raised in Abia State as armed operatives of the Nigeria Police Force were spotted at the secretariat of Peoples Democratic Party, PDP in the state. Reports reaching Naija News at the moment confirmed that armed policemen were on Thursday at the secretariat while they also restrict movement. The in and out of the secretariat located at Finbars Road, Umuahia is reportedly on surveillance by the security men.

item.title: FG Condemns Killing Of US-based Nigerian, Dennis Abuda
item.description: The Nigerian Government has condemned the killing of a Nigerian based in Atlanta, Georgia, United States, Prince Dennis Abuda. Naija News learned that Abuda alongside his family members left Fugar in Etsako Central Local Government Area in the early hours of Saturday while travelling to Lagos to catch a flight back to the U.S. when they were ambushed by the gunmen. Abuda, whose body was discovered on Wednesday during a search operation led by the Edo State Commissioner of Police, Philip Ogbadu, was allegedly shot by his abductors after he slumped while being forced into the forest.

item.title: Joshua Sasse - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Known best for his title role in the ABC musical television series Galavant and for his recurring role as Alec Laszlo in the British and Canadian police series Rogue, Sasse is also notable for his portrayal of Sergei in the 2012 feature film Frankenstein's Army. Before Fame After studying at the Cygnet Training Theatre and at Hurtwood House College, he made his screen debut in the 2010 film The Big I Am.

item.description: - Prince Harry and his wife Meghan Markle will be having an exclusive interview with media personality Oprah Winfrey - The first session will be on the 38-year-old mother of one sharing about their decision to step down from royal duties - Harry will be talking about their life in the US and what's next after the two recently announced pregnancy news of their second child. Speed Darlington Demands Payment For Being A Celebrity
item.description: Controversial Nigerian hip-hop artiste, Darlington Okoye, popularly known as Speed Darlington, has said he deserves to be paid for being a celebrity. Naija News reports that this comes a few days after the United States-based rapper came under fire after some fans recently called him out for requesting to be paid ₦5,000 before hugging or taking pictures with them. However, Speed Darlington, during an interview on the latest episode of The Honest Bunch podcast, co-hosted by media personality, Nedu, insisted that he deserved to be paid for being a celebrity.

item.title: Cesc Fbregas - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Spanish midfielder who joined Barcelona in 2011 after eight seasons with Arsenal. In 2014, he joined Chelsea FC. He became a member of the Spanish national team in 2006 and helped lead the team to its first ever World Cup Championship in 2010. Before Fame He started his youth career with Barcelona at age 10, then joined Arsenal at 16. Trivia He received the prestigious Bravo Award in 2004, the Golden Boy Award in 2006, and the PFA Young Player of the Year Award in 2007.

item.description: - Mike Sonko said he had obtained KRA, DCI, EACC and HELB clearance certificates in his quest to defend his seat - The flashy politician's move came after former Kiambu county boss Ferdinand Waititu got a reprieve after IEBC cleared him to compete in the Nairobi gubernatorial by-election - Lawyer Steve Ogolla opined Sonko cannot bounce back in any elective position because he was found to have breached the law twice, first by the county assembly and later by the Senate

item.title: Oladips Was Dead For Three Days
item.description: The personal assistant of Nigerian rapper, Oladipupo Oladimeji, popularly known as Oladips, Abdulrasheed Opeyemi, has disclosed that the rapper, who was recently declared dead by his management, actually died for three days before he came back to life. Naija News recalls that a report of the rapper’s death went viral on the internet on the 14th of November. His management wrote in a statement, “We are saddened to inform the general public that Oladipupo Olabode Oladimeji, aka Oladips, passed away yesterday, November 14, Tuesday evening, at exactly 10:14 pm.

item.title: Trailblazing Singer and Performer Tina Turner Has Died at Age 83
item.description: Legendary singer Tina Turner passed away at age 83. Here's what we know about the Queen of Rock n' Roll's cause of death. Source: Getty ImagesTina Turner Tina Turner, nicknamed the Queen of Rock n' Roll, passed away at age 83. The talented songstress was responsible for incredible songs like "What's Love Got To Do With It?," "The Best," and "We Don't Need Another Hero." Famously, she escaped a deeply abusive relationship with her longtime collaborator and partner Ike Turner, only to make one of the most impressive musical comebacks of all time.

item.title: What Happened to Luke Sandoe? What Caused His Untimely Death at 30?
item.description: Pro bodybuilder Luke Sandoe has tragically passed away at just 30 years of age and everyone wants to know what happened to him. Details inside. Luke Sandoe was a promising English bodybuilder with a presence both on and off stage that made a big impression on everyone he came into contact with. He recently competed at the COVID-19-friendly Arnold Classic competition in Columbus, Ohio, where his physique had never looked better — it was clear he had put in some serious work to get his bodybuilding game to the next level.

Luckily, you've found it. Possibly the most wonderful thing getting people through the year is the Twitter account of one Gerald Stratford. Gerald is a 71-year-old grandfather from Milton-under-Wychwood, a small village in Oxfordshire in the UK. He's also an avid gardener. And Gerald uses his Twitter account to share his gardening triumphs and adventures.

item.description: The Season 4 finale of ‘Station 19’ is finally here, and it seems like Sullivan is causing drama — again. But what did Sullivan do? When it comes to Station 19, we can always rely on Sullivan (Boris Kodjoe) and Andy (Jaina Lee Ortiz) to bring the drama and the disappointment. item.title: 2023: APC Govs Visit To Wike, Effort In Fultility
item.description: Former Senate President, Bukola Saraki has reacted to the visit of some governors of the All Progressives Congress to Governor Nyesom Wike of Rivers State. Saraki on Saturday described their visit to Wike’s residence in Port Harcourt as an effort that would not yield a result. Recall that Governor Babajide Sanwo-Olu of Lagos State, Kayode Fayemi of Ekiti State and Rotimi Akeredolu of Ondo State met with Wike in Port Harcourt on Friday.

Host Mike Richards Is Happily Married — DetailsBy Anna GarrisonPublished Aug. 5 2021, 11:58 a.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesThe late Jeopardy! host Alex Trebek left enormous shoes to fill, but it sounds like the game show may have finally found a permanent host. The show's executive producer Mike Richards is rumored to be in talks to host the show permanently. But fans want to know more about his personal life.

item.title: Man Marries Lady Who Supported His Food Business on WhatsApp, Reshared His Broadcast in 2016
item.description: A young man identified as Adefolarin Daniel Adeboye married the love of his youth, Janet Ifeoluwa Oyewunmi, whom he met on WhatsApp in 2016According to the young man, the two became friends after the lady supported his business by reposting his broadcast on a groupThe two are now married and he praised his wife for being supportive and even pledged to love and support her as they build an empire togetherA young man identified as Adefolarin Daniel Adeboye has shared how he met his beautiful wife and got married.

item.title: NNPC Boss, Kyari Names Four Firms As Culprits Of Adulterated Fuel
item.description: The Group Managing Director of the Nigerian National Company Limited (NNPC), Mele Kyari, has disclosed that four companies were responsible for the importation of adulterated fuel into the country. Speaking on Wednesday during a media briefing at the NNPC Headquarters in Abuja, Kyari said MRS, Emadeb/Hyde/AY Maikifi/Brittania-U Consortium, Oando and Duke Oil brought the substandard fuel into Nigeria. He disclosed that the investigation carried out by the company revealed that the presence of Methanol which was above Nigeria’s specification was detected in four petrol cargoes imported by the listed companies.

item.description: 'Inventing Anna' follows Anna "Delvey" Sorokin as she scams her way into the New York social scene. Here's what we know about the show's filming locations. Recently, Netflix has been amping up its true-crime content, and Inventing Anna is just one of many of the streaming platform's recent offerings. Based on Jessica Pressler's article for The Cut, the nine-episode miniseries follows a fictionalized version of Anna "Delvey" Sorokin (Julia Garner), a con woman who scams her way into the circles of New York's social elite.

item.title: Nnamdi Kanu, IPOB Dangerous For Igbo Presidency
item.description: The Chairman Emeritus of DAAR Communications Plc, Raymond Dokpesi, has stated that agitations for Biafra led by the Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB) will undermine the southeast push for Igbo presidency in 2023. In a statement on Monday reacting to an article slamming him for his views on the presidency, Dokpesi stated that although he holds nothing against Igbos, they cannot win the presidency in 2023 due to agitations to leave Nigeria.

item.description: Is 'Teen Mom OG' Star Amber Portwood Attending College in Indiana?By Toni SuttonUpdated March 30 2021, 8:59 p.m. ET Source: Instagram Usually, reality star Amber Portwood makes headlines for either domestic disputes or child custody. Back in 2019, the Teen Mom OG cast member received a felony charge for domestic battery against her then-boyfriend and the father of her child Andrew Glennon. In January, Amber was granted a restraining order against Andrew during the pair’s custody battle, which she filed in December.

item.title: Ladi Williams' Death Unfortunate - Buhari Mourns
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari has described as unfortunate, death of Ladi Williams, the eldest son of a late foremost lawyer, Rotimi Williams. Naija News had reported that Chief Ladi, aged 74, died on Sunday from COVID-19 complications at St Nicholas isolation hospital in Lagos. Buhari, in a condolence message by his spokesman, Femi Adesina, on Sunday in Abuja, condoled with the Williams family over the death of the legal luminary. According to the President, the late Williams left many in shock, particularly his close friends and professional colleagues.

item.title: Magazeti ya Jumatatu, Machi 30: Wabunge 50 kupimwa coronavirus kwa kutangamana na mbunge mgonjwa
item.description: Huku idadi ya visa vya virusi vya corona vikiongezeka hadi 42, Magazeti ya Jumatatu, Machi 30, yanaripotoi kuhusu onyo kali kutoka kwa Waziri wa Afya, Mutahi Kagwe ambaye aliwaonya wanasiasa dhidi ya kutoa habari za kupotosha kuhusu ugonjwa huo. Magazeti haya pia yanaripoti kuhusu hali ilivyo baada ya kafyu ya kuanzia saa moja usiku hadi saa kumi na moja asubuhi kuanza kutekelezwa ambapo inadaiwa watu wawili wamepoteza maisha yao baada ya kujeruhiwa na polisi.

item.title: Abdulrasheed Maina Arrested In Niger Republic
item.description: Former pension reform task team boss, Abdulrasheed Maina has been arrested on Monday evening by operatives of Nigeria Intelligence Service and anti-corruption agents. Maina, who is wanted for N2bn money laundering trial was arrested in Niger Republic, Naija News understands. According to PR Nigeria, a top intelligence officer confirmed Maina was arrested based on the existing mutual relationship and security agreement between Nigeria and Niger Republic. It will be recalled Maina is standing trial on a 12-count money laundering charge filed against him by the Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC).

item.title: Buhari, Uzodinma Meet At Presidential Villa
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari and Governor Hope Uzodinma of Imo State on Friday night met at the official residence of the President. Naija News reports that Uzodinma’s visit to the Presidential Villa may be connected to preparations to host the President in Imo State soon. The visit may also have featured discussions on Uzodimma’s role in the Presidential Council on E-Government and Digital Economy. Recall that the Imo State Governor had in June told newsmen at the Presidential Villa that Buhari had accepted his invitation to inaugurate some development projects executed by his administration.

item.title: Kirinyaga: Bi Harusi Amzomea Mama Mkwe Kwenye Hafla ya Harusini
item.description: Kisanga kilitokea katika harusi moja eneo la Kagio, Kirinyaga wakati bi harusi alipomzomea mama mkwe akimtaka kukoma kuingia ndoa yake. Duru zinaarifu kwamba mrembo alizua sarakasi baada ya kukataa kumvisha bwana harusi pete hadi pale ambapo mama huyo alipoahidi kuheshimu ndoa yao. Kwa mujibu wa Taifa Leo, sinema ya bwerere ilizuka pindi tu mchungaji alipomalizana na mahubiri. “Ningependa kuwaita bibi na bwana harusi hapa mbele,” pasta alitangaza. Maharusi walisimama walipokuwa wameketi na kuelekea madhabahuni huku nyimbo, vifijo na nderemo zikisikika kutoka kwa wawaliokuwa wamealikwa kwenye harusi hiyo.

item.title: More Trouble For Abba Kyari As NDLEA Traces N4.2bn To His And Co-accused's Bank Accounts
item.description: The embattled and suspended super cop, DCP Abba Kyari may be facing further charges as a huge sum of money believed to have been gotten illegally has been allegedly traced to his bank account. Similarly, investigations also revealed that one of his co-defendants, ACP Sunday Ubua may have also received some unexplainable funds in his accounts. Together, Naija News gathered up to a combined N4.2bn has been traced to the accounts of the suspects based on investigations been carried out by the National Drug Law Enforcement Agency (NDLEA).

item.title: Nigerian- Born Midfielder Wins Best Player Of The Tournament
item.description: Nigeria Born Spanish midfielder, Vicky Lopez, who helped her country defend its title at the 2022 FIFA U-17 Women’s World Cup has won the Best Player of the Tournament Award. The Spaniard was born to a Spanish father and a Nigerian mother. The 16-year-old received praise for her outstanding performance throughout the competition, particularly for playing a crucial part in Spain’s 1-0 victory over Colombia in the final on Sunday in Mumbai.

item.title: Tension As Senators Tackle Akpabio, Reject Tinubus Electricity Cut-Off, Military Plan In Niger Re
item.description: Some Senators have rejected the plan of President Bola Ahmed Tinubu to deploy Nigerian soldiers to Niger Republic and restore ousted President, Mohamed Bazoum to power. Recall that Tinubu, in a letter to the Senate on Friday, briefed the National Assembly on the proposed military invasion of the West African country and other penalties against the coup plotters in the Niger Republic. But according to SaharaReporters, the Senate is currently holding a closed-door executive session to discuss the deployment of soldiers and the power supply cut-off already implemented in Niger.

item.title: As Ndi Anambra Head To The Polls
item.description: The people make democracy tick. Public participation is at the core of democratic governance. All over the world, activists, leaders of thought, and social crusaders go all out to see to it that their nation adopts democracy as a system of governance. In Nigeria, some of them placed their lives on the line or even lost it just to see that citizens periodically get the chance to determine their political leaders.

item.title: BBNaija Housemate Withdraws From Reality TV Show
item.description: KayVee, one of the male housemates in the Big Brother Naija show, season 6 has officially withdrawn from the show. Naija News reports that this was announced by Big Brother on Monday. According to Biggie, Kayvee is unwell and will not be able to continue the show. Recall that other housemates like Cross, Whitemoney, JMK had complained about the housemate refusing to talk to anyone and acting strangely. The photographer has mostly kept to himself, often looking lost in thought while in the house.

He later booked the role of Nick Radford in Good Witch on the Hallmark Channel. Before Fame He moved to British Columbia, Canada with his family when he was 10 years old. Trivia He became a drama major at a fine arts school in British Columbia. Family Life He was born in London, England to Neil and Tirana Bond.

item.title: The New Lifetime Movie 'You Cant Take My Daughter' Is Heartbreaking (and True)
item.description: The Lifetime movie, 'You Can’t Take My Daughter,’ is based on the true story of Analyn Megison, a rape victim who had to fight her rapist over custody. Source: LifetimeThe Lifetime network has always been known for its dramatic original movies. Some of these are based on stories ripped right from the headlines, focusing on real-life events and real women like The Pregnancy Pact or The College Admissions Scandal. These movies are so gripping because they mirror events that have actually happened making them all the more interesting.

item.title: Aisha Yesufu Reacts To Murder Of Lagos Park Leader, Arikuyeri
item.description: Political and human rights activist, Aisha Yesufu has reacted to the murder of Mile 12 Branch Chairman of the Lagos State Park Management Committee, Sulaimon Lawal, popularly known as Arikuyeri. Naija News reports that there was pandemonium on Sunday afternoon as suspected thugs murdered the Mile 12 Park chairman. In a video circulating the internet, Arikukeyi can be seen laying on the ground while he was been beaten and macheted to death by the thugs.

item.title: Derk Cheetwood - Age, Family, Bio

His younger brother is Drew Cheetwood, who played Milo Giambetti on the same show. Associated With He got engaged to Cari Costner, director Kevin Costner's niece, in August 2006.

item.title: Oprah Winfrey - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Television host and producer who was named the most influential woman in the world by TIME magazine and hosted The Oprah Winfrey Show, the highest-rated syndicated program on air, from 1986 to 2011. She was crowned Miss Black Tennessee while in college and began co-anchoring the evening news when she was nineteen.

item.description: - An anti-mask protester has been deemed unfit to stand trial for assault - He had allegedly assaulted eNCA journalist Monique Mortlock during an anti lockdown protest - A psychiatric assessment determined that Peiser was unable to tell the difference between right and wrong PAY ATTENTION: Don't miss trending Kenyan news. Craig Peiser has been deemed unfit to stand trial and he has voluntarily admitted himself into Valkenberg Psychiatric Hospital.

item.title: Labour Party State Chairmen Affirm Confidence In Abure, Debunk Missing N3.5 Billion
item.description: The 36 state chairmen of the Labour Party (LP) have affirmed confidence in the ability and leadership of Julius Abure as the party’s National Chairman. The state chairmen passed a vote of confidence on Abure and the party’s National Working Committee (NWC) on Tuesday during a solidarity visit to the Labour Party national headquarters in Abuja. The chairmen, led by Ceekay Igara, said Abure and the NWC  have displayed a high level of integrity and administrative capacity and have their support to continue running the affairs of the party.

item.title: Lisa Lopes - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: Rapper, dancer, and singer known as Left Eye who was a member of the hip-hop group TLC who became known for the singles "Ain't 2 Proud 2 Beg" and "What About Your Friends" and won four Grammy Awards. She died in a car accident in La Ceiba, Honduras.  Before Fame She moved around from place to place while growing up before she found her home in Atlanta and joined the group Second Nature.

item.title: Nigerian Transgender Ms Sahhara Spotted At Mr World Contest
item.description: Nigerian transgender Ms Sahhara Henson was spotted at the Mr World competition held June 15 in the UK. Mr Nigeria Emmanuel Ikubese came 2nd at the contest and was also voted the most stylish participant. Right after the occasion Emmanuel took to social media to thank God for the opportunity granted and to thank people for their support. Quite unexpectedly the controversial personality Ms Sahhara was pictured with several Misters, including Mr Argentina and Mr Romania.

item.title: Wike, Ortom, Others Present As Makinde Hosts CJN Ariwoola, Wife
item.description: Governor Seyi Makinde of Oyo State, on Saturday, hosted the Chief Justice of Nigeria (CJN), Olukayode Ariwoola, and his wife at a reception held in Ibadan, the state capital. Some of the dignitaries present at the reception include Governors Nyesom Wike (Rivers), Samuel Ortom (Benue), Okezie Ikpeazu (Abia), Ifeanyi Uguwanyi (Enugu), and former Governor of Osun State, Olagunsoye Oyinlola. Speaking at the event, Makinde expressed delight that for the first time in its history the state has produced Nigeria’s number five citizen.

item.title: Briana Sprinz - Age, Family, Bio
Confusion Trails Reported Death Of Ex-Oyo NURTW Leader, Tokyo
item.description: There is confusion over the health status of a former leader of the National Union of Road Transport Workers (NURTW) in Oyo State, Lateef Akinsola, popularly known as Tokyo. Some reports claim Tokyo is dead, while others claim the NURTW leader is still alive. According to some reports in the media space, Akinsola is dead and sympathizers have thronged his Akobo, Ibadan house for condolence. But one of his sons, whose name could not be confirmed, told The Nation that the report of Tokyo’s death was untrue.

item.title: FIFA, CAF Presidents Present No. 10 Jersey To President Buhari (Photos)
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari on Thursday received the President of FIFA, Gianni Infantino and the CAF President, Patrice Motsepe at the Presidential Villa. The FIFA President during the visit to the State House, presented a number 10 jersey, a FIFA logo, and a football. The No. 10 jersey is mostly worn by icons in football who are greatly skilled. Notable footballers across the world who have worn the number 10 jerseys are Pele, Diego Maradona, Zinedine Zidane, Ronaldinho, and Lionel Messi.

item.title: Former Machachari Actor Govi Explains Why He Doesn't Have a Girlfriend: "I Have Important Things to
item.description: - Fans of Govi have been wondering whether he has a girlfriend or not, and he has finally talked about it - Machachari actors, among them Baha and Tosh, who are in their early twenties, are dating - They have been parading their girlfriends on social media, and they are so madly in love - Govi is the firstborn in a family of two and always share photos of his mother and his sister on his social pages

item.title: He's Started Pitching Skit Ideas on Twitter
item.description: It's Not a Joke: Elon Musk Will Host 'SNL,' and He's Started Pitching SkitsBy Anna GarrisonUpdated May 2 2021, 1:32 p.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesEccentric tech giant and CEO of Tesla, Elon Musk, has made a name for himself beyond the tech industry as one of the richest people on the planet. Whether he's having children with musician Grimes or creating glowing tunnels in Las Vegas, there's always something new when it comes to Elon and his exploits.

item.title: I Only Got SUVs From Dasuki, Not $300k - President Buhari
item.description: In a swift response to reports that he collected $300, 000 from the former National Security Adviser (NSA), Sambo Dasuki, President Muhammadu Buhari has made fresh clarifications. According to Eagleonline, the Nigerian president denied ever receiving cash from the embattled former NSA, who is presently embroiled in a multi-billion dollar arms deal scandal. READ ALSO: Arms Deal Probe: Why EFCC Hesitates Over Questioning Emir Sanusi [article_adwert] Femi Adesina, the special adviser on media and publicity to the president informed instead, that the president received only two Jeeps from the presidency before his inauguration on May 29, 2015.

item.title: Joe Burrow - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Quarterback who won the 2019 Heisman Trophy after a dominant senior year with the LSU Tigers in which he led the team to an undefeated season and a national title. He was selected first overall in the 2020 NFL Draft by the Cincinnati Bengals. He helped lead the Bengals to a Super Bowl appearance at Super Bowl LVI in 2021-22, but the team was defeated by the Los Angeles Rams.  Before Fame He originally committed to Ohio State University to play football.

item.title: John Mellencamp - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Singer-songwriter best known for his #1 hit song, "Jack & Diane." He has been nominated for more than ten Grammy Awards and was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 2008. Before Fame He spent many of his younger days smoking marijuana and listening to records in his native Indiana. Trivia Billy Joel inducted him into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 2008. Family Life He was married to Priscilla Esterline from 1970 to 1981, Victoria L.

item.title: Kirstie Alley - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Comic actress best known as Rebecca Howe from the television show Cheers who created the 2005 show Fat Actress. Before Fame She originally came to Los Angeles to work as an interior designer, before appearing as a game contestant on Match Game. Trivia She competed on Dancing with the Stars in 2011. Family Life She married Bob Alley in 1970, and the couple divorced in 1977. She then married Parker Stevenson in 1983 and they had two children before divorcing in 1997.

item.title: Kmart Shopper Says This Bathroom Set Looks Like Toilet Paper
item.description: Kmart Shopper Roasts Bathroom Set That Looks Like "Wet Toilet Paper" — but Some Folks Aren't AmusedBy Elizabeth RandolphPublished July 5 2023, 11:55 a.m. ET Source: TikTok/@luckyleporidaeShopping is undoubtedly a favorite pastime among those with disposable (and, in many cases, non-disposable) income and a few hours to spare. And many shoppers know that home decor is all the rage on social media platforms like Instagram and TikTok. But a woman on TikTok who took a trip to her local Kmart found a bathroom set that she wasn't so keen on buying — rather, she shared that this was one particular set to skip.

item.title: Latina Girl Group Bella Dose Is Our New Music Obsession
Lena Gercke - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: After rising to fame as the Cycle 1 champion of Germany's Next Top Model, she hosted several cycles of both Austria's Next Top Model and Das Supertalent. Before Fame She began her modeling career after booking a Burger King commercial. Trivia Her Germany's Next Top Model win was accompanied by a contract with the Paris-based IMG Models agency and a Cosmopolitan-Germany cover shoot. Family Life A native of Cloppenburg, Germany, she grew up with three sisters.

item.title: Maty Noyes - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Signed to Lava and Republic records, she gained popularity after she was featured on the Kygo single "Stay" in December 2015. She has since gained a substantial social media following of more than 140,000 followers just on her Instagram account. Before Fame She released a debut self-titled EP in 2013, but since being signed to her record labels the EP has been removed. Trivia Her single "Haunted" appeared on the soundtrack for the Julia Roberts film Secret in their Eyes.

item.title: Mwanamuziki aliyewatusi Wakamba atunga wimbo kumsifu Moses Kuria
item.description: -John Gichiri alijiingiza matatani kwa kudharau jamii ya Wakamba -Moses Kuria alitambua wimbo alioimba kumsifu na hata kuuweka mtandaoni -Gichiri alishtua Wakenya alipoimba wimbo kuwatusi Wakamba -Moses Kuria alimwokoa baada ya kutoa dhamana ya KSh250,000 aliyopewa mwanamuziki huyo alipofikishwa mahakamani Mwanamuziki kutoka jamii ya Kikuyu aliyetunga wimbo kuwadhalilishwa Wakamba ametungia wimbo mbunge wa Gatundu Kusini Moses Kuria, akimsifu. item.title: Nearly 14 Tons of DiGiorno Frozen Pizzas Are Removed From Shelves
item.description: Nearly 28,000 Pounds of DiGiorno Frozen Pizza RecalledBy Allison DeGrushePublished Sept. 28 2021, 4:49 p.m. ET Source: NestléThe FSIS announced on Sep. 26, 2021, that Nestlé USA Inc. is in the process of recalling about "27,872 pounds of frozen DiGiorno Crispy Pan Crust pepperoni pizza due to misbranding and undeclared allergens such as soy protein." As for misbranding, the box labeled as the Crispy Pan Crust pepperoni pizza may contain a frozen three meat pizza, which happens to have textured soy protein.

item.title: Police Confirm Fire At AY Makuns Lekki Mansion, Console Comedian
item.description: The Nigeria Police spokesperson, Olumuyiwa Adejobi, has consoled with comedian AY Makun after raging fire gutted his Lekki mansion on Sunday. Although AY is yet to speak on the incident, the comic actor and producer took to his Instagram page on Monday to indicate he and his family are safe. The movie star also implied that his wife and children are currently in the United States. AY, who appeared to be currently in Alberta, Canada, said he could not wait to join them.

item.description: The third child and first son of screen actress Jennifer Garner and actor and director Ben Affleck. Trivia His mother is perhaps most famous for her starring role on the television series Alias, and his father is known for co-writing and acting in Good Will Hunting and for directing and starring in Argo. item.title: Tinubu, Shettima Meets APC Governors In Lagos (Photos)
item.description: The presidential candidate of the All Progressives Congress, Bola Tinubu, on Monday met with some governors elected on the platform of the ruling party. Tinubu met with the governors at his residence in Lagos to strategise ahead 2023 general election. The vice presidential candidate of the ruling party, Kassim Shettima was also in attendance during the meeting. The Governor of Kebbi State, Atiku Bagudu, Zamfara State Governor, Bello Matawalle, Kaduna State Governor, Nasir El-Rufai, Jigawa State Governor, Mohammed Badaru Abubakar, Lagos State Governor, Babajide Sanwo-Olu, the Governor of Kano State, Abdullahi Ganduje were among the APC governors in attendance at the meeting.

item.title: What Is 'Married at First Sight' Star Stacia's Job?
item.description: Episode 7 of 'Married at First Sight' Season 15 revealed a large income disparity between Stacia and Nate. So what is Stacia's job exactly? In an iconic moment, Stacia and Nate bickered over whether or not a $700 espresso machine was a worthwhile investment on Married at First Sight Season 15, Episode 7. Honestly, their investment argument seemed solidly on-point for Stacia and Nate, given the couple's career fields. So what is Stacia's job, you ask?

item.title: What Was Jay Leno's Racist Joke on 'America's Got Talent'?
item.description: Jay Leno Is Defending Ellen but Is He the Best Moral Compass?By Devan McGuinnessUpdated Aug. 5 2020, 8:28 p.m. ET Source: Twitter / jaylenoJay Leno recently came to the defense of fellow talk show host Ellen DeGeneres amid the allegations she's facing over employee mistreatment and that she fosters an abusive and toxic workplace. The 70-year-old host tweeted his support for Ellen, but the backlash was swift with people reminding others of Jay Leno's racist joke, hinting that maybe he's not the best moral compass for this.
